title: How Saw X Fits Into the Saw Universe
description: The latest Saw installment brings Jigsaw Killer John Kramer back for a sequel set between the events of Saw I and II

title: Powerball Jackpot Rises to $925 Million
description: The jackpot for the next drawing Saturday night remains the world’s ninth-largest lottery prize of all time.

title: California Law Raises Minimum Wage for Fast Food Workers to $20 Per Hour
description: The state’s minimum wage for all other workers — $15.50 per hour — is already among the highest in the United States.

description: We have much of the technology we need to tackle climate change. Now we need to build it—quickly.

title: The Cities With the Fastest and Slowest Traffic in the World
description: Traffic moves fastest in midwestern US cities, while it's slowest in cities in India, Bangladesh, and Nigeria.

title: NASCAR to Return $1 Million All-Star Race to North Wilkesboro Again in 2024
description: North Wilkesboro was one of NASCAR's original venues, hosting more than 90 Cup races before it closed in 1996.

title: New York City Migrants Worry as Deadlines Approach to Leave Shelters
description: New York City is fighting to get rid of the right to shelter law as deadlines approach for migrants to leave their temporary residence.

title: Closing the Digital Divide
description: A new TIME100 Talks convened leaders from every field to spotlight the importance of advancing digital equity Earlier this year, I spent time with Verizon chairman and chief executive officer Hans Vestberg, who argued that digital inclusion is an essential value for modern life. Having access to online tools for learning, education, healthcare, financial services…

title: Executive Spotlight: The Importance of Digital Equity
description: Coinciding with the United Nations General Assembly and New York Climate Week, TIME hosted a discussion between Jessica Sibley, TIME CEO and Verizon Chairman and CEO Hans Vestberg focused on how individuals and companies can help close the digital divide. “The idea of equity is important because if you don’t have access to information, you…

title: Why Trump Is Talking About Electric Vehicles
description: Trump wants to put climate change at the center of the election—just not in the way those concerned about climate change might want.

description: Trump wants to put climate change at the center of the election—just not in the way those concerned about climate change might want.

title: Michael Gambon, Known For Playing Dumbledore in the Harry Potter Movies, Dies at 82
description: The veteran actor, known for playing Dumbledore in the Harry Potter films, has died at the age of 82

title: Patrick Stewart: How Star Trek: Picard Was Really Supposed to End
description: In an exclusive excerpt from his memoir 'Making It So,' the actor reveals the finale scene that was never shot and what he'd like to do next with his 'Star Trek' character

title: Decriminalizing Drug Possession Doesn’t Lead to More Fatal Overdoses
description: A new study found that overdose deaths in the Pacific Northwest have increased despite decriminalization laws, not because of them.

title: For Hospitals, ‘Nonprofit’ Doesn’t Mean ‘Charitable’

title: Thailand’s Newest UNESCO World Heritage Site Is Being Overrun by Sacrilegious Tourists
description: As Thailand celebrates a new World Heritage Site designation, locals and experts are concerned the area isn’t fit for a surge of visitors.

title: It’s Time to Marvel at the Fourth and Final Supermoon of 2023
description: The Harvest Moon rises on Sept. 28. Here's what you need to know.

description: To make our nation’s economy stronger for all, marriage and family structure must be acknowledged as a driving force of economic well-being.

description: Plenty of things about the process of getting married have remained stubbornly unchanged

title: Nagorno-Karabakh Government Declares It Will Be Dissolved
description: More than half of Nagorno-Karabakh's population has fled after the separatist government announced it will dissolve by the end of the year.

description: The rivalry between Asia’s two biggest countries has extended into outer space.

title: Both Wary of War, Taiwan’s Voters Eye China and China Eyes Taiwan’s Voters
description: Even if Taiwan’s upcoming election doesn’t go Beijing’s preferred way, a Chinese invasion remains highly unlikely. But an expected deterioration in China-Taiwan relations is bad news for both sides.

description: Taiwan’s plan to update its aging naval fleet highlights rising concerns over China’s threat, including the potential for its warships to encircle the island.

title: Republican Candidates Outbid Each Other on a Border Crackdown

title: North Korea Amends Constitution to Enshrine Permanent Growth of Nuclear Arsenal
description: The move is a show of defiance to U.S. requests to return to stalled talks through which Pyongyang could secure economic aid in exchange for disarmament.
